pullRequest.title: remove remaining instances of kil.Attribute and kil.Attributes classes
pullRequest.bodyText:
Some long-awaited cleanup. I deferred the move of the static final string variables to another PR as that will be a very noisy change to the codebase and it will be much easier to understand this diff if it's done separately. But the next PR I will make after this is merged will delete the remaining class and move the constants over to Att.
@ttuegel FYI.

commit.message: remove remaining instances of kil.Attribute and kil.Attributes classes

nodes.bodyText: This PR doesn't seem to add anything for JSON parsing handling, should we wait for the JSON module to add this?
